blogPost.title: Human Rights have come farther along than you think! Emma Varvaloucas (@heyemmavarv), host of What Could Go Right? podcast, shares how far different countries have come in recent years. https://t.co/9m7kLmJ1qa https://t.co/X3YI0y9DTz
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 人権は意外と進んでいる! What Could Go Right? ポッドキャストのホスト、Emma Varvaloucas (@heyemmmavarv) が、近年、さまざまな国がどれだけ進歩しているかを紹介します。https://t.co/9m7kLmJ1qa https://t.co/X3YI0y9DTz
人权的发展比你想象的更远! What Could Go Right? 播客的主持人Emma Varvaloucas (@heyemmavarv)，分享了近年来不同国家所取得的进展。https://t.co/9m7kLmJ1qa https://t.co/X3YI0y9DTz
人權的發展比你想象的更遠! What Could Go Right? 播客的主持人Emma Varvaloucas (@heyemmavarv)，分享了近年來不同國家所取得的進展。https://t.co/9m7kLmJ1qa https://t.co/X3YI0y9DTz

previous.title: How are climatological trends different in the Sierra Nevadas different than other mountain ranges? Andrew Schwartz (@snow_d0c), Atmospheric scientist specializing in snow @UCBerkeley, Lead Scientist at UC Berkeley Central Sierra Snow Laboratory, answers. https://t.co/HWgu1w902t https://t.co/vvjDsywfZD

localize.full_text: シエラネバダ山脈と他の山脈とでは、気候の傾向がどのように違うのでしょうか？Andrew Schwartz (@snow_d0c), 雪を専門とする大気科学者 @UCBerkeley, UC Berkeley Central Sierra Snow Laboratoryの主任研究員, 回答 https://t.co/HWgu1w902t https://t.co/vvjDsywfZD.
内华达山脉的气候学趋势与其他山脉有什么不同？Andrew Schwartz (@snow_d0c), 专门研究雪的大气科学家 @UCBerkeley, UC Berkeley Central Sierra Snow Laboratory的首席科学家，答案：https://t.co/HWgu1w902t https://t.co/vvjDsywfZD
內華達山脈的氣候學趨勢與其他山脈有什麼不同？Andrew Schwartz (@snow_d0c), 專門研究雪的大氣科學家 @UCBerkeley, UC Berkeley Central Sierra Snow Laboratory的首席科學家，答案：https://t.co/HWgu1w902t https://t.co/vvjDsywfZD
